description: Returns a list of assessment reports created in Audit Manager.

nested_items.name: assessmentReports
nested_items.description: The list of assessment reports that the ListAssessmentReports API returned.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the assessment report.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the assessment report.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the assessment report.

nested_items.name: assessmentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the associated assessment.

nested_items.name: assessmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the associated assessment.

nested_items.name: author
nested_items.description: The name of the user who created the assessment report.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the assessment report.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: Specifies when the assessment report was created.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's used to fetch the next set of results.
